DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose study evaluate safety efficacy SK-1211 inhalation challenge child bronchial asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Methacholine Chloride Inhalation Challenge Children With Bronchial Asthma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis bronchial asthma FEV1/FVC must 70 % < 10 % decrease FEV1 response inhalation normal saline Moderate severe airflow limitation（FEV1 < 60 % predicted） Heart attack stroke last 3 month Uncontrolled hypertension , systolic BP > 200 , diastolic BP > 100 know aortic aneurysm
